Text: Question about CA permitting process Cc NonPrivilegedpst Jeff My colleague Joel Schwartz and I are looking for a concise summary of the typical sitingpermitting process for a plant in California including steps in the process number of agencies and average length Any ideas Thanks again for your great remarks last Friday I really appreciated them Regards Lynne Lynne Kiesling PhD Director of Economic Policy Reason Public Policy Institute wwwrppiorg RPPI is a nonpartisan public policy think tank promoting choice competition and a dynamic market economy as the foundation for human dignity and progress
